abstract: What used to be your Facebook personal profile page will soon be known as Timeline. It will allow you to present a picture of yourself as you were once and are now.
snippet: What used to be your Facebook personal profile page will soon be known as Timeline. It will allow you to present a picture of yourself as you were once and are now.
lead_paragraph: Everyone gets old. Even the clever young men who created Facebook, which is why Facebook is no longer going to be only about who you are now. It will soon allow you to curate, as they say in digi-speak, your past.
